Description: Lip, wall and foot sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery salt-cellar; flaring rim, offset inside; ring foot; glazed black on interior and exterior; reserved: narrow lines around bottom of lip and top of foot, resting surface and underside; decoration on underside: part of a small central circle; inscription cut on exterior of wall.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 529)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.2183)
